text: @Sulliview @_cingraham Didn’t know they had influence over Mayor #deBlasio. So, he did a horrible job responding to COVID-19 because he watches Fox News? And that’s why #Cuomo forced retirement homes to take sick older people, doing thousands to die? I was not aware that they were Fox News fans
